Package uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.devices

Interface Summary
CommunicationController A class implementing this interface is one that can be used to handle carrying out tasks relating to communication sessions, specifically:
1.
CommunicationListener This is a listener interface for receiving events/notifications about a communication during a simulation.
 

Class Summary
AbstractWirelessDevice This is a class is a skeletal implementation of a supertype for all objects in the simulation which can communicate wirelessly.
Artifact This class is for representing an artifact in the communication system.
ArtifactContainer This class handles storing a collection of Artifacts.
Beacon This is a class which represents a beacon in the mobile communications system.
CommunicationEvent This event indicates a communication event (e.g.
InformationSource This is a class which represents an information source in the mobile communications system.
MobileObject This is a class which represents a mobile object in the mobile communications system.
StandardCommController This class facilitates performing a communication between two devices.
 

Enum Summary
CommunicationPhase This is a enumerated type for all the phases an AbstractWirelessDevice may be in during a communication session.
 

Exception Summary
ArtifactException An exception for attempts to create invalid artifacts or to use or transfer artifacts in an incorrect way.
CommunicationException An exception for use when an attempt for two devices to communicate is not valid.
InvalidInformationSourceException An exception for use when an information source is found to be invalid.
InvalidMobileObjectException An exception for use when a mobile object is found to be invalid.
